title: 新北/ 台灣愛立信(Ericsson)/ 人資實習生 HR Administrator/Intern
content:
【公司名稱／工作職缺】
台灣愛立信(Ericsson)/ 人資實習生 HR Administrator/Intern

【工作內容】
Job Summary:
We are now looking for a Human Resources Administrator to assist the HR representatives with day-to-day responsibilities that are crucial to our operations. Some of the responsibilities may include employee processing, employee event planning, training, visa application for fly-in staffs, and perform HR administrative tasks according to standard processes/procedures/work instructions. Maintain and manage data in applicable IT systems to ensure data quality.

Responsibilities:
- Maintain all HR data in your scope
- Provide HR administrative services
- Provide functional system expertise
- Support foreign employees for Visa/ARC application and immigration process
- Support legal case data generation and consolidation
- Provide project support such as Girls in ICT, campus talk, open day, etc

Key Qualifications:
- Majored in Human Resources/Business/ English or other related fields
- Basic Labor Relations, Laws & Legislation Knowledge
- You will need to be adept at following procedures
- HR Processes & Disciplines Knowledge
- Adhering to principles & values
- Proficient in Microsoft office
- Proficient in both Chinese and English

【工作地點】
新北市板橋區遠東路1號11樓(台北遠東通訊園區)

【工作時間】
 At least 4 hours a day, 16 hours a week (preferable 2 days /week)

【徵求條件】
- Student pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's Degree is preferred.
- Proficient in MS office.

【加分條件】
- HR intern experience is a plus.

【薪資待遇】
NTD 158/ hr

【公司福利】
1. 人性化管理、重視內部溝通及團隊精神、與不同文化國籍同事工作
2. 優良的工作環境: 每人配備工作手機(通話費補助)及筆記型電腦、員工休息區免費咖啡供應、符合人體工學可調整高度的辦公桌椅
3. 勞保、健保、團保【壽險、意外險、醫療險(含配偶及子女)、癌症險(含配偶及子女)】、海外差旅險、定期健康檢查
4. 年終獎金、績效獎金、退休金提撥、離職金制度
5. 彈性上下班、優於勞基法之休假制度、30天全薪病假
6. 完善的職能發展環境、專業或管理技能訓練、具體的工作職涯規劃、鼓勵內部升遷、跨國工作機會
7. 另有職工福利委員會提供年度國內外旅遊補助、生日禮金、三節禮金、生育補助及喪葬津貼

【聯絡方式】
Ruby Chang/ ruby.chang@ericsson.com

【其他備註】
Provide us your resume via: https://www.104.com.tw/job/5yq9u?jobsource=2018indexpoc
